<h3 id="X17838">X(17838)&nbsp;=&nbsp;ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 1st EXCOSINE TO 1st HYACINTH</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (SB+SC)*(R^2*S^2-2*(6*R^2-SW)*(3*R^2-SA)*SA)  :  :
<br>
<b>X(17838) = 3*X(154)-2*X(2931) = 3*X(10606)-4*X(12901) = 4*X(12596)-3*X(17813) = 4*X(12893)-5*X(17821)</b>
<p>X(17838) lies on these lines: {6,13}, {22,12273}, {24,12284}, {26,15085}, {30,12364}, {64,155}, {74,394}, {110,974}, {125,17814}, {146,1993}, {154,2931}, {184,12168}, {511,9919}, {1147,7729}, {1351,11807}, {1498,11744}, {1503,12319}, {1598,11800}, {1854,2771}, {2192,12888}, {3197,12661}, {3448,11441}, {5071,10821}, {5562,13171}, {5609,9826}, {5621,12358}, {5654,10224}, {6642,11806}, {6699,17811}, {6759,12310}, {7387,17846}, {9924,9934}, {10117,17834}, {10264,15068}, {10606,12901}, {10628,12164}, {11064,12317}, {11456,12383}, {12160,13417}, {12228,17809}, {12236,17810}, {12292,14094}, {12293,17824}, {12295,15811}, {12308,13352}, {12412,13754}, {12596,17813}, {12893,17821}, {12900,17825}, {13358,13861}, {14516,14683}, {15131,17822}</p>
<p>
X(17838) = reflection of X(64) in X(12302)<br>
